card.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
card.property: +2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target. −X: Exile each permanent with converted mana cost X or less that's one or more colors. −10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Alpine Watchdog
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On the eighth day, a blizzard hit. Supplies were lost, and morale plummeted. On the ninth day, Dover found us."—*To the Summit: A Tale of Survival*

card.name: Angelic Ascension
card.property: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within her battalion she was known as the Angel of Arkvale. Until now, that was only a metaphor.

card.name: Anointed Chorister
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) {4}{W}: Anointed Chorister gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sing of benevolence and mercy, of golden wings bringing comfort to the meek and downtrodden."

card.name: Aven Gagglemaster
card.property: Flying When Aven Gagglemaster enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An aven's gear is enchanted to avoid weighing them down during aerial maneuvers.

card.name: Baneslayer Angel
card.property: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

card.name: Basri Ket
card.property: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn. −2: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures attack this turn, create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. −6: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control."

card.name: Basri's Acolyte
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) When Basri's Acolyte enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Basri carries on his god's legacy, spreading her teachings throughout the Multiverse.

card.name: Basri's Lieutenant
card.property: Vigilance, protection from multicolored When Basri's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever Basri's Lieutenant or another creature you control dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

card.name: Basri's Solidarity
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The will to fight and act as one is not limited to a single world. Oketra's teachings are universal."—Basri Ket

card.name: Celestial Enforcer
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I look to the heavens for hope, but you will kneel."

card.name: Concordia Pegasus
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the cloudy skies and dim light of autumn, a flash of white wings is a reminder that better times lie ahead.

card.name: Containment Priest
card.property: Flash If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

card.name: Daybreak Charger
card.property: When Daybreak Charger enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's often mistaken for the coming dawn as it gallops across the horizon.

card.name: Defiant Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

card.name: Dub
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types.

card.name: Faith's Fetters
card.property: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

card.name: Falconer Adept
card.property: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My falcons are family, as much as any other member of my clan."

card.name: Feat of Resistance
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons are extinct on Tarkir, but Abzan magic still emulates their endurance.

card.name: Gale Swooper
card.property: Flying When Gale Swooper enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be glad the griffin set you back on your feet when it was done with you. My goat wasn't so lucky."—Arram, goatherd

card.name: Glorious Anthem
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The songs of angels are perceived not as words in the ears but as stirrings in the soul.

card.name: Griffin Aerie
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When griffins started nesting atop the northern tower, the castellan worried they'd be a nuisance. Instead, they took the entire castle under their protection.

card.name: Idol of Endurance
card.property: When Idol of Endurance enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard until Idol of Endurance leaves the battlefield. {1}{W}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among the cards exiled with Idol of Endurance without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Legion's Judgment
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

card.name: Light of Promise
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The light washed over him, and in the wind he heard the roars of all the pridemates who had come before.

card.name: Makeshift Battalion
card.property: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

card.name: Mangara, the Diplomat
card.property: Lifelink Whenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or a planeswalker you control, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Nine Lives
card.property: Hexproof If a source would deal damage to you, prevent that damage and put an incarnation counter on Nine Lives. When there are nine or more incarnation counters on Nine Lives, exile it. When Nine Lives leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: Pack Leader
card.property: Other Dogs you control get +1/+1. Whenever Pack Leader attacks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn to Dogs you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He will be your loyal champion, and his pack your protectors. All he asks for is a full belly, a spot by the fire, and all the love in your heart.

card.name: Rambunctious Mutt
card.property: When Rambunctious Mutt enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empathic words with powerful gestures. Clearly this was playtime.

card.name: Revitalize
card.property: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in." —Torricks, battlefield medic

card.name: Runed Halo
card.property: As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, choose a card name. You have protection from the chosen name. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.)

card.name: Sanctum of Tranquil Light
card.property: {5} {W}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An untroubled mindDwells in perfect harmonyWith a peaceful heart.

card.name: Seasoned Hallowblade
card.property: Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know that I'll win every fight. But I have faith, and that's carried me this far."

card.name: Secure the Scene
card.property: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know it's a great show when the Azorius arrest the props, too!"—Judith, the Scourge Diva

card.name: Selfless Savior
card.property: Sacrifice Selfless Savior: Another target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She raised him from an orphaned pup and gave him a life of love. With his last act, he thanked her.

card.name: Siege Striker
card.property: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Whenever Siege Striker attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Siege Striker gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Speaker of the Heavens
card.property: Vigilance, lifelink {T}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if you have at least 7 more life than your starting life total and only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All are welcome in the angels' light."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gilded with gold from a dragon's trove, it is! And etched with the image of the dragon I slew to take it."

card.name: Swift Response
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face." —Adrasteia, Akroan captain

card.name: Tempered Veteran
card.property: {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it. {4}{W}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been carrying a sword since before you were born. I wouldn't give up my oath for all the peace and comfort in the world."

card.name: Valorous Steed
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) When Valorous Steed enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A unicorn chooses only the most virtuous and noble of knights to be its companion.

card.name: Vryn Wingmare
card.property: Flying Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's the favored mount of military commanders as well as anyone with a flair for the dramatic.

card.name: Warded Battlements
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In dire times, even a place of refuge can become a weapon of war.

card.name: Barrin, Tolarian Archmage
card.property: When Barrin, Tolarian Archmage enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand. At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent was put into your hand from the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no age at which you stop learning."

card.name: Cancel
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I decide what stands in my way."

card.name: Capture Sphere
card.property: Flash Enchant creature When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Discontinuity
card.property: As long as it's your turn, this spell costs {2}{U}{U} less to cast. End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: Enthralling Hold
card.property: Enchant creature You can't choose an untapped creature as this spell's target as you cast it. You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I offered to pay him to do the job, but he refused. So I took matters into my own hands."—Tahim, the Puppetmaster

card.name: Frantic Inventory
card.property: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Frantic Inventory in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Another village, another angry mob. Why do I even bother unpacking?"

card.name: Frost Breath
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

card.name: Ghostly Pilferer
card.property: Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card. Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Jeskai Elder
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Jeskai Elder deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Keen Glidemaster
card.property: {2} {U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear is a rational response, but waiting won't make it any easier. Just jump!"

card.name: Library Larcenist
card.property: Whenever Library Larcenist attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I specialize in missing manuscripts, pilfered poetry, and lifted letters."

card.name: Lofty Denial
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with flying, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage scowled as yet another bolt splashed harmlessly against seemlessly empty air.

card.name: Miscast
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Next time, try something more appropriate for your skill level."—Barrin, Tolarian archmage

card.name: Mistral Singer
card.property: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sang of storms, there came a squall. I sang of waves, the seas grew tall. I sang of love, but no voice called."

card.name: Opt
card.property: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

card.name: Pursued Whale
card.property: When Pursued Whale enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with "This creature can't block" and "Creatures you control attack each combat if able." Spells your opponents cast that target Pursued Whale cost {3} more to cast.

card.name: Rain of Revelation
card.property: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it."

card.name: Read the Tides
card.property: Choose one — • Draw three cards. • Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Charts and instruments work fine, but the best navigators aren't above a spell or two to nudge the tides in a more favorable direction.

card.name: Rewind
card.property: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

card.name: Riddleform
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn. {2}{U}: Scry 1.

card.name: Roaming Ghostlight
card.property: Flying When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some who die senseless deaths return as formless spirits, seeking answers where there are none.

card.name: Rookie Mistake
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stop locking your knees as you strike! Now satnd up and try it again."

card.name: Rousing Read
card.property: Enchant creature When Rousing Read enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Great literature can transport the reader.

card.name: Sanctum of Calm Waters
card.property: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of Shrines you control. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Truth lurks in the depths,Invisible from the shore.Knowledge inundates.

card.name: See the Truth
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, put each of those cards into your hand instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is this that is neither future nor past?"

card.name: Shacklegeist
card.property: Flying Shacklegeist can block only creatures with flying. Tap two untapped Spirits you control: Tap target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Blessed Sleep doesn't come easily to a mind chained by regrets.

card.name: Shipwreck Dowser
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Shipwreck Dowser enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost at sea doesn't have to mean lost forever.

card.name: Spined Megalodon
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever Spined Megalodon attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Stormwing Entity
card.property: This spell costs {2}{U} less to cast if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn. Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Stormwing Entity enters the battlefield, scry 2.

card.name: Sublime Epiphany
card.property: Choose one or more — • Counter target spell • Counter target activated or triggered ability. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. • Target player draws a card.

card.name: Teferi, Master of Time
card.property: You may activate loyalty abilities of Teferi, Master of Time on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant. +1: Draw a card, then discard a card. −3: Target creature you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.) −10: Take two extra turns after this one.

card.name: Teferi's Ageless Insight
card.property: If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fine, you know more than me. But do you have to be such a show-off about it?"—Chandra Nalaar, to Teferi

card.name: Teferi's Protege
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Teferi's legacy lives on in Tolaria through the study of time magic and a tradition of irrepressible mischief.

card.name: Teferi's Tutelage
card.property: When Teferi's Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tarassel's sixth law of temporal recursion is easy to understand as long as you know the first seven."

card.name: Tide Skimmer
card.property: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fishing boats often follow hunting drakes to find the largest schools of fish.

card.name: Tolarian Kraken
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, you may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's contemplative, resourceful, and original. Everything else aside, it's the perfect student."—Naban, dean of iteration

card.name: Tome Anima
card.property: Tome Anima can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes knowledge takes on a life of its own.

card.name: Unsubstantiate
card.property: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts."—Liliana Vess

card.name: Vodalian Arcanist
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using education as an antidote to xenophobia.

card.name: Waker of Waves
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0. {1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the open sea, there is nowhere to hide.

card.name: Wall of Runes
card.property: Defender When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."—Omik, superintendent of waterworks

card.name: Alchemist's Gift
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Archfiend's Vessel
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) When Archfiend's Vessel enters the battlefield, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, exile it. If you do, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

card.name: Bad Deal
card.property: You draw two cards and each opponent discards two cards. Each player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are still places where a smile and a handshake are all you need to seal a deal.

card.name: Blood Glutton
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some savor the hunt. I savor the kill."

card.name: Caged Zombie
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Six consecutive life sentences" takes on a new meaning when necromancy is involved.

card.name: Carrion Grub
card.property: Carrion Grub gets +X/+0, where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard. When Carrion Grub enters the battlefield, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)

card.name: Crypt Lurker
card.property: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the rats refuse to set foot inside. I fear to think what might be waiting in there."—Gravedigger's journal

card.name: Deathbloom Thallid
card.property: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life."—Marwyn of Llanowar

card.name: Demonic Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+1, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types. You may cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard by paying 3 life and discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Duress
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Eliminate
card.property: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.

card.name: Fetid Imp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Finishing Blow
card.property: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this world, it's kill or be killed. I'd rather not be the latter."

card.name: Gloom Sower
card.property: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First, the darkness fell. Terror came next. After that, only despair remained."—*The Tragedy of Morein*

card.name: Goremand
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Flying Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) When Goremand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Grasp of Darkness
card.property: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I welcome the use of even the foulest magic if it will rid us of the monstrosities that plague our world." —Munda, ambush leader

card.name: Grim Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As blood touched the empty page, it formed words that seared themselves into the wizard's mind.

card.name: Hooded Blightfang
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker.

card.name: Infernal Scarring
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

card.name: Kaervek, the Spiteful
card.property: Other creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defy me and I will burn the flesh from your bones. Betray me and I will steal the breath from your lungs."

card.name: Kitesail Freebooter
card.property: Flying When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Liliana, Waker of the Dead
card.property: +1: Each player discards a card. Each opponent who can't loses 3 life. −3: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard. −7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste."

card.name: Liliana's Devotee
card.property: Zombies you control get +1/+0. At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana inspires horror in many and fanatical admiration in a few.

card.name: Liliana's Standard Bearer
card.property: Flash When Liliana's Standard Bearer enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Liliana's Steward
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Liliana's Steward: Target opponent discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Servants at Vess Manor are chosen for their strong work ethic and respectful demeanor. Being alive is not required.

card.name: Malefic Scythe
card.property: Malefic Scythe enters the battlefield with a soul counter on it. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each soul counter on Malefic Scythe. Whenever equipped creature dies, put a soul counter on Malefic Scythe. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Masked Blackguard
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) {2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her footsteps are whispers, her passage a last breath.

card.property: When Massacre Wurm enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

card.name: Necromentia
card.property: Choose a card name other than a basic land card name. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles their library, then creates a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: Peer into the Abyss
card.property: Target player draws cards equal to half the number of cards in their library and loses half their life. Round up each time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, don't be so dramatic. When your eyes bleed, and your brain leaks out your ears, then we'll talk about lost sanity."—Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Pestilent Haze
card.property: Choose one — • All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. • Remove two loyalty counters from each planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your crops will rot. The air itself will turn against you. You will suffer as I have suffered." —Karaz, outcast

card.name: Rise Again
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I love those who are eager to serve."—Liliana Vess

card.name: Sanctum of Stone Fangs
card.property: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of Shrines you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renounce all limits,False chains binding potential.Power knows no bounds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drink from the vein? How provincial."—Lord Duchorvin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being trapped between two forms of unlife is a fate worse than mere death.

card.property: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

card.name: Village Rites
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were so eager to take and consume. Yet when asked to give, you refuse?"

card.property: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life. {3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through the blood of the wicked, we shall be redeemed. Let us pray."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Witch's Cauldron
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best recipes start with reliable cookware.

card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

property.name: Flavor

card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.property: +1: Discard your hand, then exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. +1: Chandra, Heart of Fire deals 2 damage to any target. −9: Search your graveyard and library for any number of red instant and/or sorcery spells, exile them, then shuffle your library. You may cast them this turn. Add six {R}.

card.property: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Draw a card.

card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments."—Karavin, renegade saboteur

card.property: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your eyes aren't playing tricks on you. I am."

card.name: Fiery Emancipation

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day the mountain's fire will rise up to burn away our chains and end this age of oppression."—*The Molten Prophecy*

property.name: Flavor

card.property: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "I'd rather go out in a blaze of glory than fade away and be forgotten."

property.value: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Whenever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

card.property: When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card. Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.) Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.value: "If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

card.property: When Llanowar Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Llanowar look to their past to determine the shape of their future.
